title: E314 Jimmy John Liautaud
itunes:title: Jimmy John Liautaud
description:
Theo sits down with Jimmy John Liautaud, the founder and former CEO of Jimmy John's, to talk about how he took a sandwich shop in a tiny, remodeled garage and turned it into a billion dollar chain. They also discuss their views on the entrepreneurial spirit of America today, and Jimmy gives advice on how everyone can find happiness and fulfillment in whatever they do.
